entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
